name: Incarnation (Idan Rooze)
description:
Incarnation is a mouse-only roguelite with reverse progression. 

Experience a divine entity's descent from the heavens through a series of procedurally generated levels. After each level, you must lose one of your celestial powers until you are completely transformed into a human.

Will you be able to reach mortality?

The game currently only supports 1920x1080 resolution. Sorry!

Mouse: move and attack

The game was created as the final project of my Visual Communication bachelor's degree in Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design.

Music by Amit Katzengold.

Sound effects adapted from ZapSplat under an attribution license.
